title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set

**Product Description:**

Add a touch of festive charm to your home with our stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This beautiful set includes a 23.6-inch diameter wreath and an 8.8-foot long garland, both adorned with a mix of snowflake pine needle branches, 2 types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches.

**Lighting Features:**

* 100 warm LED lights that add a cozy ambiance to your space
* Battery-operated with 3 AA batteries required (not included)
* Timer function: 6 hours on, 18 hours off for convenient use

**Product Details:**

* No assembly required - simply hang and enjoy!
* Made with high-quality, sturdy materials that are hypoallergenic and fireproof
* Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, perfect for walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows

**Durability and Maintenance:**

* Strong and durable construction ensures long-lasting use
* Maintenance-free - no need for watering, and the lights will never fade

**After-Sales Service:**

* 365-day warranty for peace of mind
* 24-hour customer service availability for any questions or concerns

**Order now and get ready to deck the halls with this beautiful Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set!**

**Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set**

**Product Description:**

Add a touch of festive elegance to your home with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. This beautiful set features a 23.6-inch diameter wreath and an 8.8-foot long garland, perfect for decorating your walls, doors, fireplaces, and more.

* Made with sturdy, high-quality materials that are hypoallergenic and fireproof
* Wreath and garland feature a mix of snowflake pine needle branches, 2 types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches for a lush and festive look
* 100 warm LED lights are strategically placed throughout the wreath and garland to create a warm and inviting ambiance
* Powered by 3 AA batteries (not included) with a convenient timer function that turns the lights on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours

* Built to last, our wreath and garland are strong and durable, requiring minimal maintenance
* No need to water or care for the wreath and garland, and they will never fade or lose their color

**Product Listing:**

**Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set**

**Add a Touch of Festive Cheer to Your Home with Our Stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set**

Get ready to deck the halls with our beautiful Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, perfect for adding a touch of festive cheer to your home's exterior or interior. This gorgeous set features a 23.6-inch diameter wreath and an 8.8-foot long garland, both adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, 2 types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches.

**Illuminate Your Space with 100 Warm LED Lights**

Our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set comes with 100 warm LED lights that will add a cozy ambiance to your home. The lights are battery-operated, requiring 3 AA batteries (not included), and feature a convenient timer function that turns them on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

**Durable and Low-Maintenance**

Made with sturdy, high-quality materials, our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set is built to last. The hypoallergenic and fireproof pins ensure safe and worry-free use. Plus, with no need for water and no fading, you can enjoy your wreath and garland for years to come.

**Versatile and Easy to Use**

This set is perfect for indoor or outdoor use and can be easily hung on walls, doors, fireplaces, or windows. With no assembly required, you can start decorating right away.

**Worry-Free Purchase with 1-Year Warranty and 24/7 Customer Service**

We stand behind the quality of our product and offer a 1-year warranty and 24/7 customer service to ensure your complete satisfaction.

**Order Your Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set Today and Get Ready to Spread Some Holiday Cheer!**
